title: Mini-Ep 161: 35 Forever, Alone Never
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 161: 35 Forever, Alone Never
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets into Pinterest-y meal-planning, and Doree learns a grittier side of self-care. Then, listeners send in support and advice for the listener recently diagnosed with breast cancer, ask about Doree’s micellar water routine, and reveal surprising ...
description:
Kate gets into Pinterest-y meal-planning, and Doree learns a grittier side of self-care. Then, listeners send in support and advice for the listener recently diagnosed with breast cancer, ask about Doree’s micellar water routine, and reveal surprising news about Sephora. 


Activity of the Week: One quiet meal, if you can.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.
  • IROBOT - Check out the Roomba i7+ Robot Vacuum and learn more at irobot.com/forever35. 
  • THERAGUN - Go to Theragun.com/forever35 to try the Theragun Gen 4 today!
  • MILK + HONEY - For 20% off your first order visit milkandhoney.com and use promo code FOREVERPOD.
  • BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today. 


Theme music by Riot.
